name: Mojo Verde
description: A vibrant green Canary Islands sauce made with cilantro, garlic, jalapeño, and lime, perfect for grilled meats.

ingredients.item: 1 large bunch cilantro, leaves and tender stems only

instructions: In the bowl of a food processor or blender, combine the cilantro, garlic, lime juice, cumin, jalapeno, white wine vinegar, and olive oil.
Season generously with kosher salt and serve immediately, or cover and refrigerate until ready to use.
